::Kluster::

Kluster nods. "I've always said that once you get to the battlefield, 
you have to forget almost everything they tought you in training in 
order to survive."





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Tarantopulous: It just was a bit hard to give up what I've trained 
for. But
> that's okay...
